name: Achilles (itch) (AlonMakeGames)
description:
You play as Achilles who is facing an horde of trojan soldiers trying to stop you. Little do they know only your heel is vulnerable to attacks!! Use this information to cleverly best all of your opponents.

Too hard? Finish Guarana Myth so you'll be able to consume the mystical guarana fruit and become stronger.

Note:

This game was made as part of the second Totem game jam. All the games in the jam (and in Totem in general) are connected via “legacy event’s”. If you play this game while connected to your account (all you need to do is login to google) how you play this game will affect the content of other games in Totem. There are 3 legacy events in this game:

Slayer- survive all 5 waves of enemies and defeat Hector

Deceiver- receive 10 and above non damaging attacks 

Untouchable- Finish the game without losing a heart

  Controls

Movement with arrow keys

Dash with 'Z'

Attack with 'X'

Pause with 'P'

Restart with 'R'
